meaningMnemonic: They <radical>say</radical> <radical>sheep</radical> are <kanji>detailed</kanji> creatures. I mean, I never thought sheep were very detailed, but that’s what they say.
readingMnemonic: The reason these sheep are so <kanji>detailed</kanji> is that they are trying to impress the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう). If they're fancy enough, perhaps the Shougun won’t kill them for their meat and make their wool into clothing.
